name: project_3-chow_town
description: # Description  Chow-Town is a search engine based app that helps users  beable to find resturants near desired locations all   over the world. Users will also be able to give raitings  to these resturants to these places that they enjoyed,   and be able to have some forum fun on our main page  by   being able to make posts onto our main page, they will   be able to delete and edit their posts.
